title: How to Find and Add Friends on Skype: 4 Simple Ways

steps.title: Tap Contacts.
steps.content: Tap Contacts . This is the tab at the bottom-right corner. If you aren't already logged into your Skype account , do so now.

steps.title: Tap the "New Contact" icon.
steps.content: Tap the "New Contact" icon. You can find this in the bottom-right corner. This looks like a person with a + icon. [2] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Type the full name, Skype username, or email address into the field.
steps.content: Type the full name, Skype username, or email address into the field. A list of users that match your search criteria will automatically populate in the section below the search field.

steps.title: Tap the person you want to add.
steps.content: Tap the person you want to add. This will open their profile in full. Depending on their privacy settings, you may see additional details such as profile photo, location, online status , and more.

steps.title: Tap Add contact.
steps.content: Tap Add contact . This is below their profile picture. The request will be sent to the user. Depending on their privacy settings, you may be able to send a message before they approve. Navigate to their profile and click Send message .

steps.title: Tap the search field.
steps.content: Tap the search field. This is at the top of the page, underneath your Skype name.

steps.title: Type the full name, Skype username, or email address into the field.
steps.content: Type the full name, Skype username, or email address into the field. A list of users that match your search criteria will automatically populate in the section below the search field.

steps.title: Tap More underneath "Skype directory".
steps.content: Tap More underneath "Skype directory". This will load all profiles that match your search.

steps.content: Click Contacts . This is near the top of the left panel, underneath your Skype name and status. If you aren't already logged into your Skype account, enter your email address, username, or phone number and password to do so now.
